speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing alright, thanks. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m reaching out regarding your account with City Bank. Can I have your last four digits of your Social Security number to start?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. You currently have an outstanding balance of $500. When can we expect payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I didn’t realize I had a balance. I need to check my finances first.

speaker: Agent
text: I understand. It’s important to keep track of your accounts. Would you like to set up a payment plan?

speaker: Customer
text: I might consider that, but I need a little time.

speaker: Agent
text: Of course. Just to let you know, we can offer flexible plans. What would be a good time to follow up with you?

speaker: Customer
text: How about next week? I should have a clearer view then.

speaker: Agent
text: Sounds good! I’ll reach out again next week. Thank you for your time.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you, Mark. I appreciate your understanding.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day.
